title: SoundScapes - Sound Effects
longDescription:
Hello Dev!


This pack was created with the intention of providing you with a series of soundscapes/ambient sounds for your game in different scenarios, all of them with the intention of making your game player feel in the place he is as much as possible.


You will find a variety of scenarios here such as forest, night, rain, beach, decks, and many others, some even futuristic.


The interesting thing about this pack is that it can serve you for more than one project, given that the available scenarios appear in more than one game, so investing in this pack, you can be guaranteeing sound effects for more than one project.


By investing in this package you take all that and help me to co-create quality sound effects at a super cool price! :D


Check the Preview

Check the Documentation

Check the Making off

technicalDetails:
Number of Audio Waves: 25

Number of Audio Cues: 25

Sample rate / bit rate: (i.e. 22,050 or 44,100 Hz) 44,100

Do Sound FX loop: (Yes/No) Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 20 Minutes

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: (Yes/No) yes

Mac: (Yes/No) Yes

Important/Additional Notes: The recorder used for the sounds is the H4N pro, and the image is distributed free of charge for commercial use by pixabay.
